channel.title: Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Assignments
item.description: Problem sets are due on the day of the lecture listed and must be submitted before the start of class. They can be completed individually or in study groups. SES # ASSIGNMENTS L4 Problem Set 1 (PDF) L6 Problem Set 2 (PDF) L10 Problem Set 3 (PDF) L16 Problem Set 4 (PDF) Two days after L18 Problem Set 5 (PDF)

item.title: pset1.pdf
item.description: Problems related to the use of the Balance Sheet Equation to record transactions and for the preparation of financial statements

item.title: pset2.pdf
item.description: The following questions refer to the Chemalite, Inc case in the course pack (Wilson, David A. ?Chemalite,Inc.? Boston,,MA: Harvard Business School, 2003. Case No. 9-177-078). You should ignore the 5 questions at the end of the case and answer the following in their place.

item.title: pset3.pdf
item.description: Problems related to revenue recognition and accounting for account receivables.

item.title: pset4.pdf
item.description: Problems related to accounting for depreciation, delta-pan am airlines case write-up, depreciation calculation, and inferring cash flows from depreciation disclosures.

item.title: pset5.pdf
item.description: Problems related to deferred taxes and marketable securities.
